section.name: Tabs
section.p: The page configuration area allows you to create Tabs for creating new pages across the top of the window. enter the Page Name, Title and Short Title. The Short Title field will be the name of the Tab in the window. Once you have the Tab created, you may change the name, move the page left or right and delete the page.

Once the page is created, you may also change the Decorator Theme for the Window, change the Layout Columns and set a global Portlet theme. Add Portlets to your page and you now have a new page that can only be seen by you and is completely separate from any of the other pages. Adding Portlets is covered in the Portlet Section of Customizing.
